question: Your local council has decided to close the only park in your town and build a car park in its place. You believe this will have a bad effect on the people who live and work in the town.Write a letter to the mayor. In your letterintroduce yourselfexplain why you think the decision is wrongsay what you think the council should do insteadYou should write at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear Sir or Madam,
text: I heard that the council has just decided to close our park which is large and beautiful. And also the council had built  a vehicle park area, so I am writing to tell you about this problem.

First of all, in this letter, I will introduce my self. I am Furkan, and I am a computer engineer in a company which is very famous. In addition, we have lived in  Istanbul with my family for 2000 years.

There are a lot of wrong decisions. As you know, there are plenty of children in our district, and also most of the kids are under  six years old, so if you remove this park, these little kids can not play outside because there are not any places else.

you should do different things. I have an idea about building a park. there is an area where you will build a car park but it is not near to the centre. Although this place is not very close to the centre, people will confirm this decision in order for children.
I look forward to catching up with you soon.
